Hey, I'm Jake

THE RUNDOWN

What I Do

Web Development

Web design and development. Who doesn't like websites? I think CSS is FUN and INTERESTING.

Writing

I've been writing since they first let me. Marketing copy and web content + whatever else I can get away with.

Digital Marketing

Where to begin with this one? Web commerce solutions, SEO, BIG DATA -- you name it.

Who I am

I'm a web dev and writer in Birmingham, Alabama.

I grew up somewhere in Alabama and earned a BA from UAB in 2021. I studied humanities like philosophy and literature. I still do but I did then too.

At some point I also underwent rigorous technical training (it's called a coding bootcamp for a reason). This would grant me the uncommon power to center divs and change text colors.

Most of my leisure time is spent on meandering walks, reading, cooking, or talking about philosophy uninvited.

I have a job too. I currently work with the beautiful people at The Atomic Agency.
